short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick a random restaurant from the 10bis homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of having to choose from the endless options available in 10bis? Can't think of anything you feel like eating?

Randomeal here for the rescue!

All you need to do is:
   1. Install the extension on your chrome.
   2. Give it the access to the 10bis tab.
   3. Click the GET RANDOM RESTAURANT button.

There you got it - a random restaurant.

Not satisfied with the option received? Go back and try again :)

*** This extension has nothing to do with 10bis or takeaway. It is just built on the 10bis website as a side project. It does not fetch any user information or do anything other than click on a random restaurant in the homepage.

*** Don't believe me? Take a look at the code: https://github.com/hadasarik/randomeal

All icons made by Pixel perfect: www.flaticon.com
